name: Flatspark
tagline: FlatSpark is a flat skin for Flex 4 projects
body:
# FlatSpark FlatSpark is a Spark Skin for Flex 4. We don't think Flex applications should look like the same boring outdated Flex skin, so we wanted to make a skin that feels more like it was made for the new web. There are still a bunch of components missing, but we wanted to release this version so we can get a spark on the community (no pun intended). It is inspired by the beautiful work done by [DesignModo](http://designmodo.github.io/Flat-UI/). ### Checkout our [wiki](https://github.com/akamud/FlatSpark/wiki) for more info on how to use. Access the demo: [http://www.flatsparkskin.com](http://www.flatsparkskin.com) Here's where we got so far:

New components:

Pull-requests are more than welcome! ## Authors @brunopacola, @akamud ## Prerequisites Apache Flex 4.12.1
